forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 51F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.
